STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. BETHZAIDA PADUA STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. WILFREDO CALVENTE STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. MIRANDA VIRGILIA CALVENTE Sol E. Mahoney, special public defender, in support of the petition. Michele C. Lukban, assistant state’s attorney, in opposition. Decided January 22, 2003

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
